text: |Topic area|Policies|Key monitoring indicator| |||| |Town centres|TC1 - Supporting the network and hierarchy of town centres|Proportion and number of town centre uses (class E) within town centres| ||TC2 - Supporting the diversity, vitality and viability of our town centres|Town centre vacancy rates| ||TC3 - Town centre uses outside our town centres|Number and floorspace of new town centre uses approved outside of town centres| ||TC4 - Markets|Number of pitches and vacancy level in council-operated street markets| ||TC5 - Food and drink|Number and proportion of hot food takeaways in town centres; number of new hot food takeaways permitted across the borough; number of new hot food takeaways permitted within 400m of an existing or proposed school or local authority leisure centre|
